ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_issh | |- ( H e. SH <-> ( ( H C_ ~H /\ 0h e. H ) /\ ( ( +h " ( H X. H ) ) C_ H /\ ( .h " ( CC X. H ) ) C_ H ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_ax-hfvadd | |- +h : ( ~H X. ~H ) --> ~H |
| 3 |  | #P_ffun | |- ( +h : ( ~H X. ~H ) --> ~H -> Fun +h ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- Fun +h |
| 5 |  | #P_xpss12 | |- ( ( H C_ ~H /\ H C_ ~H ) -> ( H X. H ) C_ ( ~H X. ~H ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_anidms | |- ( H C_ ~H -> ( H X. H ) C_ ( ~H X. ~H ) ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_fdmi | |- dom +h = ( ~H X. ~H ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl6sseqr | |- ( H C_ ~H -> ( H X. H ) C_ dom +h ) |
| 9 |  | #P_funimassov | |- ( ( Fun +h /\ ( H X. H ) C_ dom +h ) -> ( ( +h " ( H X. H ) ) C_ H <-> A. x e. H A. y e. H ( x +h y ) e. H ) ) |

| 17 |  | #P_funimassov | |- ( ( Fun .h /\ ( CC X. H ) C_ dom .h ) -> ( ( .h " ( CC X. H ) ) C_ H <-> A. x e. CC A. y e. H ( x .h y ) e. H ) ) |

| 20 | 19 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( H C_ ~H /\ 0h e. H ) -> ( ( ( +h " ( H X. H ) ) C_ H /\ ( .h " ( CC X. H ) ) C_ H ) <-> ( A. x e. H A. y e. H ( x +h y ) e. H /\ A. x e. CC A. y e. H ( x .h y ) e. H ) ) ) |
